EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Big Data Roadshow_Q117.Confirmation - Shanghai
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Shanghai. Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Thursday, 30 March 2017, 9.00 - 17.30 Location: 上海市市辖区静安区沪太路335号 (map <[[http://map.baidu.com/?latlng=31.261321,121.459258&title=3W+Coffice%E2%80%A2%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E9%9D%99%E5%AE%89%E5%BA%97&content=%E9%9D%99%E5%AE%89%E5%8C%BA%E6%B2%AA%E5%A4%AA%E8%B7%AF335%E5%8F%B7&autoOpen=true&l]]>)
如您有任何问题，请及时拨打我们的客户热线 400-135-8900
